author: Special Correspondent
text:
The spotting of pug marks suspected to be that of a wild animal created a scare among residents of Vellanur village in the district on Monday.

Acting on an alert from the residents who feared that the pug marks could be that of a panther, forest, and revenue officials inspected the spot on Monday late night to determine whether the marks were that of a panther as suspected by the local people.

The Forest Department officials said a team was stationed at the village on Monday night as a precautionary measure. A senior department official said the pug marks were found to be that of a dog and not that of any big wild animal as suspected.
title: Pug marks create a scare in village
